DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the Connect® MM Registry is to explore the natural history and real world management of patients with newly diagnosed symptomatic multiple myeloma (MM) and provide unique insights into the management of MM and the impact of this hematologic disorder on patients.
DOC.brief_title: Connect® MM- The Multiple Myeloma Disease Registry
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnosed with symptomatic MM within 2 months of enrollment in Connect®MM registry Age ≥18 years Willing and able to provide signed informed consent Agrees to complete patient assessment questionnaires either alone or with minimal assistance from caregivers and/or trained site personnel None
